description: This json file contains the corrections for the deepJet, robustParticleTransformer, particleNet AK4 jet taggers for the Run3Summer22 campaign. Working points for the tagging algorithms are also supplied in this file (wp_values).

corrections.name: deepJet_wp_values
corrections.description: Working points values of the b-jet discrimination for deepJet in Run3Summer22. The L/M/T/XT/XXT working points correspond to 10/1/0.1/0.05/0.01% light jet-misidentification rates.

output.name: wp
output.description: Working point value of the b-jet discriminator

corrections.name: robustParticleTransformer_wp_values
corrections.description: Working points values of the b-jet discrimination for robustParticleTransformer in Run3Summer22. The L/M/T/XT/XXT working points correspond to 10/1/0.1/0.05/0.01% light jet-misidentification rates.

output.name: wp
output.description: Working point value of the b-jet discriminator

corrections.name: particleNet_wp_values
corrections.description: Working points values of the b-jet discrimination for particleNet in Run3Summer22. The L/M/T/XT/XXT working points correspond to 10/1/0.1/0.05/0.01% light jet-misidentification rates.

output.name: wp
output.description: Working point value of the b-jet discriminator
